subject: Golf
Surgery and Surgeons
lead_paragraph: Tiger Woods said he had begun riding a stationary bike, could not move fast enough to catch his 13-month-old daughter and would not start swinging his golf clubs until next year. Woods said things were getting a “lot better” seven weeks after having surgery to reconstruct the torn anterior cruciate ligament in his left knee.
